name: Charles Buczel
body:
### Welcome
Hi. I'm a freelance software engineer based in London

### About
* 08.2015 -        Senior UI Developer (Contract) @ HSBC
* 01.2014 - 07.2015 Senior UI Developer @ Thomson Reuters
* 06.2013 - 01.2014 JavaScript Engineer @ Bonza Gaming
* 11.2012 - 05.2013 Senior Software Engineer @ JIT Solutions
* 07.2010 - 10.2012 Software Engineer @ Kainos
* 07.2009 - 10.2009 IT Trainee @ Vector
* 06.2009 - 07.2009 IT Trainee @ Eaton

* 10.2007 - 02.2011 BSc Eng in Computer Science @ Gdansk University of Technology

### Expertise

* Web and mobile development. UI/UX.
* Vanilla JS. ES5/ES6.
* Backbone/Knockout/Angular/Ember/React/Dojo...
* Node. Express.
* HTML5. CSS3. LESS/SASS/STYLUS
* Data visualisation. statistics. R. D3. Threejs.

### Contact
@linkedin: charlesbuczel
@github: charlesbuczel 
@gmail: charles.buczel
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
